words.source: Conditional particle introducing temporal clause; KJV, ESV, NASB
2ms imperfect of עבד (to work, till); KJV 'tillest', ESV 'cultivate', NASB 'cultivate'
Direct object marker; marks the following noun as definite object
Definite feminine noun אֲדָמָה (ground, soil, earth); KJV, ESV, NASB
3fs imperfect of יסף (to add, continue); indicates ongoing action; KJV 'shall yield', ESV 'will yield', NASB 'will yield'
Infinitive construct of נתן (to give); KJV, ESV, NASB
Masculine noun כֹּחַ (strength, power, produce) with 3fs possessive suffix; KJV 'strength', ESV 'produce', NASB 'crops'
Preposition ל with 2ms pronominal suffix; KJV, ESV, NASB
Masculine participle of נוע (to wander, flee); KJV 'fugitive', ESV 'fugitive', NASB 'vagrant'
Conjunction ו with masculine participle of נוד (to wander, flee); paired with נָע to express single concept of homelessness; KJV 'wanderer', ESV 'wanderer', NASB 'wanderer'
2ms imperfect of היה (to be); KJV, ESV, NASB
Preposition ב with definite feminine noun אֶרֶץ (earth, land); KJV 'in the earth', ESV 'on the earth', NASB 'on the earth'
